title: Recruitment Officer Job at Ascentech Services Limited
content:
Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Recruitment Officer
Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid, 3 Days onsite)

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We're looking for a talented and ambitious recruiter to support our recruitment efforts.
	As a key member of our Talent Acquisition team, you will play a critical role in analyzing recruitment data, identifying trends, and providing insights to inform our recruitment strategies.
	You will also assist in coordinating recruitment processes, managing candidate data, and ensuring compliance with recruitment policies.


Responsibilities


	Data Analysis: Analyze recruitment data, including candidate sources, time-to-hire, and other key metrics to identify trends and insights.
	Recruitment Process Support: Assist in coordinating recruitment processes, including scheduling interviews, managing candidate communications, and ensuring compliance with recruitment policies.
	Candidate Data Management: Manage candidate data, including updating candidate records, tracking candidate progress, and ensuring data accuracy.
	Reporting and Insights: Provide regular recruitment reports and insights to stakeholders, including hiring managers, talent acquisition team members, and senior leadership.
	Process Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvements and propose solutions to enhance recruitment efficiency and effectiveness.
	Compliance and Risk Management: Ensure compliance with recruitment policies, procedures, and regulatory requirements, and identify potential risks and mitigation strategies.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
	 1 - 2 years of experience in recruitment, talent acquisition, or human resources.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret data and provide insights.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact with stakeholders at all levels.
	Proficiency in recruitment software, including applicant tracking systems (ATS), and Microsoft Office.


Salary
N150,000 / month

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cv@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Transport Officer Job at Kelvix Consult




        
    

        
        Kelvix Consult - Our client, a reputable courier company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Transport Officer

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Our client is seeking to recruit a Transport Officer with extensive experience in last-mile delivery and inter-city parcel movement.
	The ideal candidate will oversee the planning, coordination, and optimization of all transport activities, including developing reliable partner networks (road and air), enhancing delivery speed, reducing costs, and improving customer satisfaction through data-driven decisions.


Job Objective
The ideal candidate will be responsible for task below:


	To identify, negotiate, and manage reliable transport partners—both road and air—to ensure timely, cost-effective, and secure inter-state movement of parcels from Lagos to other destinations. The Transport Manager will optimize transport efficiency, reduce costs, ensure safety standards.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and onboard reliable transport partners (logistics firms, airlines, and independent fleet owners) to support parcel movement from Lagos to other Nigerian states.
	Negotiate favorable contract terms with transport partners to ensure cost efficiency without compromising delivery speed or security.
	Develop and implement strategic plans for optimizing inter-state parcel movement through multimodal channels (air and road).
	Ensure delivery schedules are met with minimal delays and that parcels are handled with care and proper documentation.
	Work closely with dispatch and customer service teams to synchronize parcel pickup, transfer, and final-mile delivery timelines.
	Establish SLAs with partners and enforce compliance with service standards, safety, and insurance regulations.
	Monitor transportation costs, generate cost-reduction initiatives, and maintain budget adherence.
	Track, analyze, and report delivery performance metrics including TAT (Turnaround Time), partner reliability, incident rates, and transport cost per kg/item.
	Resolve transportation bottlenecks and escalate risks such as route blockages, theft, or delays proactively.
	Implement and ensure strict compliance with national transport laws, roadworthiness, cargo safety standards, and aviation logistics requirements.
	Conduct periodic audits of transport routes, partners’ capabilities, and parcel handling protocols to ensure continuous improvement.


Requirements and Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Business, or related field.
	5 - 7 years of experience in transportation or logistics management, with a proven track record in third-party partner sourcing and coordination.
	Strong negotiation, vendor management, and contract administration skills.
	Knowledge of Nigerian transport networks, aviation cargo operations, and regulatory frameworks.
	Experience with route planning, load optimization, and cost control strategies.
	Ability to multitask and work under pressure in a fast-paced, e-commerce-driven environment.
	Strong Excel and reporting skills; familiarity with transport management systems (TMS) is a plus.
	Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.


Salary
N250,000 - N350,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: kelvixconsult@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only candidates who meet the criteria outlined above will be considered. If you do not meet the requirements, we kindly ask that you do not apply.
